title: IS_PED_IN_COMBAT
content:
0x4859F1FC66A6278E0xFE027CB5// IsPedInCombat
BOOL IS_PED_IN_COMBAT(Ped ped, Ped target);Parameters:ped: Ped index.target: Examines whether the ped is engaged in combat; when given a target ped index, it confirms if the ped is actively fighting the specified target, returning true if engaged and false if not.
codeBlocks:
// IsPedInCombat
BOOL IS_PED_IN_COMBAT(Ped ped, Ped target);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_PED_IN_COMBAT
IsPedInCombat(ped, ped)
